title: immask
description: Masks the input image based on specified criteria and produces the output image

threshold.title: Threshold Value
threshold.description: Threshold value; all pixels with absolute value below this will be set to zero in the output image

mask_image.title: Mask Image
mask_image.description: Mask image; only locations that are nonzero in the mask image will be nonzero in the output image

positive_only.title: Positive Only Flag
positive_only.description: Use only positive pixels from input image
